collection_holder_name: New York Public Library for the Performing Arts, Dorothy and Lewis B. Cullman Center
pageContext.collection_title: Music for the connoisseur [sound recording] : Mendelssohn.
pageContext.collection_description: In 1st work: Harry Zarief and David Mankovitz, violins ; William Schoen, viola ; Maurice Bialkin, violoncello. In 2nd-6th works: Joan Bishop, soprano ; Vernon Duke, piano. David Randolph, host ; with unidentifed radio announcer.
